alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:56AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Imperial County through 130 AM PDT... At 1256 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles north of Algodones Dunes, or 19 miles west of Martinez Lake, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Imperial County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Mountains; Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley
